text: Meet the Fockers is a 2004 American comedy movie. It was produced by Robert De Niro, Jon Poll, Jay Roach, Jane Rosenthal and Nancy Tenenbaum and was directed by Jay Roach. Meet the Fockers was released on December 22, 2004 in North America. The movie received mixed reviews with a 39% rating on Rotten Tomatoes and a 41 out of 100 from Metacritic. It is the first sequel to the 2000 movie, Meet the Parents. The second sequel which was called, Little Fockers was released in 2010. == Cast == * Ben Stiller as Gaylord "Greg" Myron Focker * Robert De Niro as Jack Tiberius Byrnes * Dustin Hoffman as Bernard "Bernie" Focker * Barbra Streisand as Rosalind "Roz" Focker * Teri Polo as Pamela "Pam" Martha Byrnes * Blythe Danner as Dina Byrnes * Spencer and Bradley Pickren as Little Jack * Alanna Ubach as Isabel Villalobos * Ray Santiago as Jorge Villalobos * Owen Wilson as Kevin Rawley ==References== == Other websites == *Meet the Fockers' Official website * * Category:2004 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American sequel movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about families Category:Movies directed by Jay Roach Category:Movies set in Florida Category:DreamWorks Pictures movies Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Meet the Fockers
